member.name: T:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.Configurations.Configuration
member.summary: Represents the module configuration settings.

member.name: M:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.Configurations.Configuration.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: T:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaColumn
member.summary: Stores metadata for table column mapping.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaColumn.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the database column that the current member is mapped to.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaColumn.IsPersistent
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the current member value is persisted in the backend database table.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaColumn.IsAssociation
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the current member has an association.

member.name: T:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaMember
member.summary: Stores mapping metadata for the class member.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaMember.Member
member.summary: Gets the mapped type member.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaMember.DeclaringType
member.summary: Gets the meta type, which declares the current member.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaMember.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of the current member.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaMember.Accessor
member.summary: Gets the meta accessor for the current member.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaMember.IsKey
member.summary: Gets the value, indicating whether this member is a key field.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaMember.IsPersistent
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the current member value is persisted in the backend database table.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaMember.IsAssociation
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the current member has an association.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaMember.IsNullable
member.summary: Gets the value, indicating whether a DbNull.Value value can be stored in the database.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaMember.AutoUpdate
member.summary: Gets the value indicating that the column must be updated after each insert and update.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaMember.AutoGenerated
member.summary: Gets the value, indicating whether this field is autogenerated by the database on insert.

member.name: T:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.MetaType
member.summary: Stores information related to table-to-type mapping

member.name: T:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.TableAttribute
member.summary: Use this attribute on classes that should be persistable. Only classes decorated with this attribute are supported by the framework.

member.name: M:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.TableAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the attribute.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.TableAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the database table which is used to store instances of this class.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.TableAttribute.Schema
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional schema name with which to prefix the table name in queries.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.TableAttribute.Projection
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the optional database view which is used to select instances of this class.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.TableAttribute.Serializer
member.summary:
Gets or sets the type of the
which is used to materialize instances of this class and send them back to the database.

member.name: T:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.ColumnAttribute
member.summary: Use this attribute to identify the properties of the entity objects that map to table columns. If no specific name is supplied, then the column and property names must be identical. This attribute can also be used to override constraints.

member.name: M:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the database column for storing the property decorated with this attribute.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.Nullable
member.summary: Gets or sets the value, indicating whether null values are allowed in the database.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.AutoUpdate
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating that the column must be read after each insert and update.
member.remarks: Setting AutoUpdate to true is primarily useful for columns that are set internally by the database. Using this feature will significantly impact performance for the worse, as for every update/insert another select will be performed.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.IsKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the value, indicating whether the property or field is mapped to the primary key column.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.AutoGenerated
member.summary: Gets or sets the value, indicating whether this column value is automatically assigned by the database on insert.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.Binder
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the which is used to convert between database column and property values.

member.name: T:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.AssociationAttribute
member.summary: Use this attribute to mark properties referencing data in a remote table. It is used by the framework to map property names of one object to other objects.

member.name: M:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.AssociationAttribute.#ctor
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of the
attribute. This will relate the decorated property to the specified column in the given table.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.AssociationAttribute.ThisKey
member.summary: Gets ot sets the name of the column, which relates to the other type.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.AssociationAttribute.OtherKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the column, which this instance relates to.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.AssociationAttribute.Projected
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this association is included in the projection.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.AssociationAttribute.Persistent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this association key is persisted by the ThisKey column.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.AssociationAttribute.Prefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix for the projection subset.

member.name: P:Radischevo.Wahha.Data.Mapping.AssociationAttribute.CanBeNull
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this association can be set to null.

member.summary: Executes the provided against the provided data source and returns the result.

member.summary: Gets the initial size of the resulting collection.

member.summary: Executes the provided against the provided data source and returns the result.

member.summary: Gets the initial size of the resulting collection.
